law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 134, sec. 1, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2001 Ky. Acts ch. 138, sec. 1, effective June 21, 2001.

metadata.lrc-note: (3/19/2013). This statute was amended by 2013 Ky. Acts chs. 26 and 134, which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
